description: MBOXRD is one of the MBOX family of related file formats used for holding collections of email messages within a single file. MBOXRD files adds one greater-than sign (“>”) to any line that begins with zero or more ">" followed by "From ".
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">text</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: MBOXRD Email Format
